description: This file sets up an agent using the 'agno' framework with a Gemini model, and runs an asynchronous method to print a response based on a prompt.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an agent that interacts with a language model, configured with specific instructions and output format.

classes.name: RunResponse
classes.description: Represents the response from running the agent.

classes.name: Gemini
classes.description: A Google model used within the agent, identified by a specific ID and instructions.

methods.name: agent.run
methods.description: Executes the agent with a given prompt and returns a RunResponse.

methods.name: agent.aprint_response
methods.description: Asynchronously prints the agent's response to a prompt.
